entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He is described as having glittering eyes in his mask, fixed on Harry and himself.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character who Voldemort's attention is focused on. No further description of Harry is provided in the text.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is one of Voldemort's Death Eaters, described as having faked his own death to escape justice.

relationships.description: Voldemort's attention is focused on Harry, as described in the text: 'The glittering eyes in their masks fixed up on Voldemort, and upon Harry.'
Voldemort mentions that Wormtail was driven out because he had faked his own death to escape justice. This implies a relationship of possession or control between Voldemort and Wormtail.
